parameters.query:
SELECT * FROM purchases_new
WHERE export_sheets = "N" AND (status = "paid" OR status = "Efetivado") AND launch_tag = "SSP-L16" 
LIMIT 300

SELECT * FROM launch_leads
WHERE (user_id = {{ $json.id_user }} OR email = "{{ $json.email }}") AND launch_key = "SSP-L16"
